Class AnimatingNodesState

Namespace
FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States
Assembly
FlowGraph.Avalonia.dll

Input state active during node animations (position transitions, appear/disappear effects). Allows viewport interactions (pan/zoom) while blocking node interactions.

public class AnimatingNodesState : InputStateBase, IInputState
Inheritance
object

Constructors

AnimatingNodesState(IEnumerable<string>?, Action?, Action?)

Creates a new node animating state.

public AnimatingNodesState(IEnumerable<string>? animatingNodeIds = null, Action? cancelAnimation = null, Action? onExit = null)

Parameters

animatingNodeIds IEnumerable<string>

IDs of nodes currently being animated.

cancelAnimation Action

Action to cancel the running node animations.

onExit Action

Optional callback when exiting this state.
